name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This update is a bit smaller than most; a lot of us have been busy with holiday prep and such. That said, you can expect a few bug fixes and some christmas flavor added to the mix, until our next major update. Thanks for your patience and enjoy the holidays!

Along with the 0.9.9.8B Update, comes updates to some of our other custom programs also: D2RLaunch and The Vault. D2RLaunch has been updated to 2.4.2 to fix Vault updating and The Vault has been updated to 1.1.6 to fix many issues as well as update the item catalog. Please update both along with the mod files for best results. You may want to clear config data to re-generate the item catalog.
